name: website-template
description: AI-powered website template with Ralph Wiggum loop, OpenCode skills, and Google Trends integration

scripts.validate: npm run validate:json && npm run validate:typescript
scripts.validate:json: tsx -e "import fs from 'fs'; const files = ['ralph-wiggum.config.json']; console.log('Validating JSON files...'); files.forEach(f => { try { JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f, 'utf-8')); console.log('✓', f); } catch(e) { console.error('✗', f, e.message); process.exit(1); } });"
